meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

abstract.p: Summary of some major stories on inside pages

block.p: Raid in Gaza Kills 8 Israeli troops entered an industrial zone on the outskirts of Gaza City and fought gun battles that killed eight Palestinians, including militants and civilians.
Taxi Fare Increase Proposed The Taxi and Limousine Commission proposed a 26 percent fare increase, which, if passed, would be the first in eight years.
Raid in Gaza Kills 8 Israeli troops entered an industrial zone on the outskirts of Gaza City and fought gun battles that killed eight Palestinians, including militants and civilians.
Taxi Fare Increase Proposed The Taxi and Limousine Commission proposed a 26 percent fare increase, which, if passed, would be the first in eight years.
Reversal of Fortune for Arts President Bush wants to increase the budget of the National Endowment for the Arts, which in years past was under attack.
Remembering Jack Paar Dick Cavett recalls his days writing for Mr. Paar and, with an eyebrow raised, pays homage to this mercurial talent.
